website_summaries.verdict: Dedicated place to sit down in the hallway when getting ready to go outdoors.
pros: Storage underneath is big enough to keep clothing and accessories for the outdoors in one location
cons: Can take extra time to set up and position

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and kid like bench
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible to put together! It was easy as far as following instructions, but this thing has so many screws. The size looks like a kid's bench. This is low and won't hold a lot in the storage part. I only let one adult sit on it at a time. If I had to do it over, I would have bought something bigger, definitely not this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah SJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute bench!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bench for our entryway by the staircase, that had both a backrest and storage. This serves exactly that. It was well packed and provided with clear instructions. Having a handy drill helps with the screws. Due to the partition in the middle of the storage space though, it won’t fit a lot of large items but we just needed something to store scarves, gloves, etc. so this was perfect for that. It is very cute looking and can be a great accent to any room. The rustic brown is a gorgeous chocolate brown color. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G.

customer_reviews.title: this is a very nice toy box
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very nice toy box, or boot bench. It will work better for younger, smaller people, as it is low to the floor. It is smaller than I expected. I should have done my measuring first. I am in my 60's and I do not enjoy sitting so low, especially getting back up. I plan to put it on a mat or brick...base. It has a nice finish, soft wood, so the screws go in easily, but I don't think this will last long enough to become a family heirloom! I was able to put it together by myself. It does look as good as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Schuemann

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Its a nice addition to our mud room. love the storage. We have had it for about 7 months now and it is holding up great. We through things on it all the time and barely shows a scratch. It was easy to put together. Cute accent for any room and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1983

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! Worth much more than it costs. Packaged really well. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Girard

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 100%
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great. Even comes with extra hardware (that I didn't need). Honestly, I could have told my friends that I paid 300$ for it and they would probably believe me. I was surprised when both me and my girlfriend sat on it and I swayed a little to see how stable it was - it didn't move. The wood is the perfect dark color match for my house. Satisfied 100%
customer_reviews.author: psienide k

customer_reviews.title: A very well made and attractive product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product and totally sturdy enough to hold two people. I was able to assemble it almost by myself in about 30 minutes but needed help from my wife for a couple of minutes to hold the seat as I attached it to the hinges. The seat height is a bit low as other comments have stated but for an entry way place to take shoes on and off it is fine. We are happy with the quality and sturdiness of this product. It looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: "tim-lfp"

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent and cute bench, could improve in quality.
customer_reviews.text: A pretty decent and cute bench. Assembly would've been smooth if the pieces fit correctly. I had to chisel off some parts to make the bottom base board slide in to the left side leg unit - it would just not fit otherwise (the lower wooden strip which was suppose to hold the baseboard was tilted - I tried removing the 3 screws on it but it was glued as well - so had no option but either to return or fix it myself). Apart from that glitch, it was really good. My daughter loves it! I like it as it doesn't take up much space, yet a good utility.
customer_reviews.author: Shibs

customer_reviews.title: Mostly well-made, with a prominent weakness
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived very well packaged. The instructions were mostly detailed and clear. The back rest of the bench is weak and does not attach well to the rest. If someone sits on it to put on shoes, and if that person leans back heavily or suddenly, there is a very good chance that the back rest will detach from the rest of the bench. This makes it somewhat inappropriate to use in an entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: screw them while holding this heavy piece of wood flat to avoid twisting one side) but once done it looked great and feels very solid
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit strenuous to build on my own (especially the part that flaps open/close - You have to position the 2 hinges, screw them while holding this heavy piece of wood flat to avoid twisting one side) but once done it looked great and feels very solid. The height is perfect to sit on while putting / lacing shows. Good storage inside. This feels like solid quality. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Francois Roy

customer_reviews.title: It”s just very small .
customer_reviews.text: I Dislike how small it is . It’s so short ! It looks like something for a child’s play room . Made well just too small . Now I gotta out where to put it smh . Heavy too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the manufacturing process was very good; all hardware was included and the holes and ...
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to assemble; however, the manufacturing process was very good; all hardware was included and the holes and embedded fasteners were well positioned. The center support post under the bottom of the unit could be a bit more robust; the same applies for the screws used to attach the center support post to the base of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Pilot in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how it looks and fits in my entryway. Very sturdy product with a surprising amount of room to store shoes and work boots
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL! This is a smaller size bench, but for my space it works perfectly. It can fit most any area. The wood is a rich warm color, and the storage is perfect for all my winter throws. Easy assemble. I do not hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norman E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Using as dining bench
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to put up against our wall in dining room and plan to move to table if needed for the kids to use when company here. They are both in boosters so it would lift them up perfectly. I tried it and it only puts me about an inch lower than normal to the table. Not that much of an inconvenience. Very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: looks great, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and super easy to put together. This is one of the best designed and built pieces of furniture requiring assembly that I've ever put together.
customer_reviews.author: torcoah

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on this product. Reviewed bench dimensions to understand the actual product size. Found this very helpful. Very pleased with this bench. Perfect our needs. Average effort required for assembly. Added two cushions and a decorative pillow. One of our cats have taken to the bench within one day. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not as great of quality as was advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not as great of quality as was advertised. It shows grown ups sitting on it, and I am scared to sit on it because it starts creaking like it is going to break, but it works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: elmo247

customer_reviews.title: It holds a bunch of our shoes and everyone can sit on it to easy put their shoes on
customer_reviews.text: It was what I was looking for. It holds a bunch of our shoes and everyone can sit on it to easy put their shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench! Shipped with all the pieces and parts (none of which were damaged) and was easy to assemble (~1 hour). I wish the instructions or packaging had a listed weight limit, however I could not find one anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Steal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of furniture. Easy to put together and it looks good and appears to be quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Bamaphin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is very useful in the mud
customer_reviews.text: Back is really short and uncomfortable... storage is smaller than expected... Looks great and is very useful in the mud room
customer_reviews.author: DirkMan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the finish and the color is as shown. Easy to put together. This is much higher quality wood than some of the other similar products I tried before this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship and quality looks good but I would not buy this again as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship and quality looks good but I would not buy this again as it is really too small. It really looks like a kids bench.
customer_reviews.author: Asim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks great. It was easy to assemble. I would recommend a pillow (or I use a blanket folded to fit the seat) to keep from scratching the seat with buttons on back pants pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Rboyer918

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build - Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Great bench a for storage. Supports me (240lb) with ease. Wouldn't recommend using it as step ladder. Looks amazing and the finish is great. A lot of extra parts in case you have a screw roll underneath something.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Simon

customer_reviews.title: Interior photo would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't aware that the inside was divided...bummer, because I bought it to store yoga mats on the patio. Assembly wasn't as easy as some kits (kits have become so simple and intuitive, there's just no excuse!). I assembled it without the interior divider so I could fit the yoga gear, but without the interior divider, you can't attach the center leg/brace. So it's an ornamental storage bench...I could sit on it without the brace, but I wouldn't let anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to put together. Had trouble finding a cushion that fit to put on top so bought three small pillows but it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Stein

customer_reviews.title: Measure height
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Seems sturdy but not as tall as i thought it would be. It almost looks miniature. Please measure height before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Was a little obnoxious to put together
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Was a little obnoxious to put together, but nothing crazy by any means! Looks way nicer in person than on the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Deiiiiidra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was perfect for what I had ordered it for. Compact design, decent quality for price. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: well put together for the price. Very easy instructions with even the nut and bolts/screw packets numbered
customer_reviews.author: P. Dor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy piece of furniture. Easy assembly. Holes line up surprisingly well for the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: User83

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assessable
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assessable. The bench is made of wood except one bottom piece. A great piece for the entryway.
customer_reviews.author: MLi

customer_reviews.title: The quality could be better, the arms and lifting bench do not line ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality could be better, the arms and lifting bench do not line up well and scrape. We tried to adjust it but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the storage space
customer_reviews.text: Little shorter than I thought as far as height. Love the color and the storage space. Not that difficult to put together. The support middle leg on the bottom screws are too short...it wobbles. I plan on removing it don't see the need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well protected in the shipping carton, easy to assemble and looks great! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not for homes with kids or pets
customer_reviews.text: The piece is beautiful. Everything was securely packaged and labeled. All the tiny parts were individually packaged. My issue is how delicate the wood/stain is. Within a day, a combination of children and dog had put scratches on the stain, down to the wood. Normal kid behavior. Sat on bench, button on jeans scratched it. Dog put paws on seat, scratched it. Really only functional if your home is a museum.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great until my husband try to screw in some screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great until my husband try to screw in some screws to the interior of the bench and both heads of the screws broke off. So my husband had to make new holes so now the seat doesn't go down slowly.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench. Hinges could be a bit stronger but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. Hinges could be a bit stronger but works fine for us
customer_reviews.author: butternut

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Adams SOLID WOOD 48 inch Wide Entryway Storage Bench with Safety Hinge, Multifunctional, Rustic, in Rustic Medium Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Rustic BrownWe designed the Adams Storage Bench, using the finest solid wood, to make sure that the entrance to your home is something you can be proud of. This stylish, functional bench makes a design statement while creating added storage and seating for your entryway or mudroom. "Form follows function" design rules apply here as the bench features a convenient flip up lid allowing for easy retrieval of articles from the dual storage compartment below.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 17" D x 48" W x 25.2" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Pine
HAND FINISHED with a Rustic Medium Brown stain and a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL with storage can be used in many rooms throughout your home; in your front hallway, entryway, at the foot of your bed, or in your living or family room
Features lift up bench lid with safety hinges and 2 large internal storage compartments
Rustic style includes classic shaker style front panel and horizontal ladder patterned back.
Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography

At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
